name: caddy-stateful-jwt-auth
description: Stateful JWT authentication middleware for Caddy with Redis-backed token revocation - provides immediate token invalidation capabilities
author: chalabi
features: Stateful JWT authentication with immediate token revocation
Redis-backed token state management with O(1) lookups
Multiple JWT signing algorithms (HS256, RS256, ES256, EdDSA, etc.)
JWK support with automatic key refresh
Multiple token source support (headers, query, cookies)
TLS Redis support for cloud deployments

integration.note: This plugin integrates JWT authentication functionality from ggicci/caddy-jwt with Redis-based state management, providing a stateful JWT solution that eliminates the need for separate JWT auth plugins.
